getInitialState

public State getInitialState()
Returns the initial state of this workflow.

Returns:
The initial state

getLeavingTransitions

public Transition[] getLeavingTransitions(State state)
Returns the transitions that leave a state. This method is used, e.g., to disable menu items.

Parameters:
state - A state.
Returns:
The transitions that leave the state.

getVariableNames

public java.lang.String[] getVariableNames()
Returns the variable names.

Returns:
A string array.
